title: 'I’ve never voted before, but...': NASCAR star backs this candidate in US 2024 election
content: Former NASCAR and IndyCar star Danica Patrick has announced her first-time vote for Donald Trump in the 2024 election, emphasizing its importance. She joined Trump’s running mate, JD Vance, at a town hall, confirming her strong support for the re-election campaign. Patrick has been active in Trump’s campaign, drawing attention for her controversial endorsements.
summary: Former NASCAR and IndyCar star Danica Patrick has announced her first-time vote for Donald Trump in the 2024 election, emphasizing its importance. She joined Trump’s running mate, JD Vance, at a town hall, confirming her strong support for the re-election campaign. Patrick has been active in Trump’s campaign, drawing attention for her controversial endorsements.

title: 'Candidate for our times': Kamala Harris featured on Vogue’s October cover
content: Kamala Harris graces Vogue's October digital cover, being portrayed as the 'candidate for our times' after Biden's decision to end his reelection campaign. Featured in a Gabriela Hearst suit at her Washington home, Harris discusses her campaign plans, focusing on lowering costs for Americans, and recalls the dramatic moment Biden informed her of his decision.
summary: Kamala Harris graces Vogue's October digital cover, being portrayed as the 'candidate for our times' after Biden's decision to end his reelection campaign. Featured in a Gabriela Hearst suit at her Washington home, Harris discusses her campaign plans, focusing on lowering costs for Americans, and recalls the dramatic moment Biden informed her of his decision.

title: Activists replace Picasso’s 'Motherhood' painting with Gaza image to protest UK support for Israel
content: Two Youth Demand activists pasted a Gaza photo over Picasso’s 'Motherhood' at the National Gallery to protest UK arms sales to Israel. They poured red paint on the floor and were arrested. The protest called for a two-way arms embargo to stop the alleged genocide in Gaza.
summary: Two Youth Demand activists pasted a Gaza photo over Picasso’s 'Motherhood' at the National Gallery to protest UK arms sales to Israel. They poured red paint on the floor and were arrested. The protest called for a two-way arms embargo to stop the alleged genocide in Gaza.

title: Seattle woman 'left to rot' in suitcase at homeless encampment
content: A Seattle woman's remains were found in a suitcase at a homeless encampment, underscoring safety issues at such sites. Authorities are investigating her death, urging public assistance for information. Homeless encampments are linked to higher crime rates and public health risks, with ongoing concerns about the lack of regulation and safety for vulnerable populations.
summary: A Seattle woman's remains were found in a suitcase at a homeless encampment, underscoring safety issues at such sites. Authorities are investigating her death, urging public assistance for information. Homeless encampments are linked to higher crime rates and public health risks, with ongoing concerns about the lack of regulation and safety for vulnerable populations.

title: Two dead and several injured in deadly gas leak at Pemex refinery in Texas
content: A hydrogen sulfide gas leak at Pemex's Deer Park refinery in Texas resulted in two fatalities and the treatment of up to 35 people. The incident led to the shutdown of a coker and a hydrotreater, and residents were urged to stay indoors temporarily. The leak originated from a sulfur recovery unit.
summary: A hydrogen sulfide gas leak at Pemex's Deer Park refinery in Texas resulted in two fatalities and the treatment of up to 35 people. The incident led to the shutdown of a coker and a hydrotreater, and residents were urged to stay indoors temporarily. The leak originated from a sulfur recovery unit.

title: 'The View' host Whoopi Goldberg claps back at Trump after he calls her comedy 'dirty'
content: Whoopi Goldberg and Sunny Hostin responded to former President Trump's remarks calling Goldberg's comedy 'filthy and dirty' and branding The View's panelists as 'dumb.' Goldberg defended her past performances and criticized Trump, highlighting his own controversial statements and hiring decisions. She humorously questioned Trump's judgment, emphasizing he had hired her multiple times despite his criticisms.
summary: Whoopi Goldberg and Sunny Hostin responded to former President Trump's remarks calling Goldberg's comedy 'filthy and dirty' and branding The View's panelists as 'dumb.' Goldberg defended her past performances and criticized Trump, highlighting his own controversial statements and hiring decisions. She humorously questioned Trump's judgment, emphasizing he had hired her multiple times despite his criticisms.

title: TikTok star Taylor Rousseau Grigg's cause of death revealed
content: Taylor Rousseau Grigg, a 25-year-old TikTok influencer with over 1.4 million followers, passed away due to a severe asthma attack and complications from Addison's disease. Her husband Cameron announced her sudden death, praising her bravery and strength. Taylor was an organ donor, and her story raises awareness of her health struggles and enduring spirit.
summary: Taylor Rousseau Grigg, a 25-year-old TikTok influencer with over 1.4 million followers, passed away due to a severe asthma attack and complications from Addison's disease. Her husband Cameron announced her sudden death, praising her bravery and strength. Taylor was an organ donor, and her story raises awareness of her health struggles and enduring spirit.

title: Who is judge Arun Subramanian? New Judge assigned to Sean 'Diddy' Combs sex-trafficking case
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs' federal criminal sex trafficking case has been reassigned to Judge Arun Subramanian, providing Combs another chance to apply for bail. The trial date is set for May 5 in Manhattan. Combs, pleading not guilty, faces charges including sex trafficking by force, transportation for prostitution, and racketeering conspiracy.
summary: Sean "Diddy" Combs' federal criminal sex trafficking case has been reassigned to Judge Arun Subramanian, providing Combs another chance to apply for bail. The trial date is set for May 5 in Manhattan. Combs, pleading not guilty, faces charges including sex trafficking by force, transportation for prostitution, and racketeering conspiracy.

title: Before becoming a King, Prince George wants to be ...
content: Prince George, could break the royal tradition of serving in the Armed Forces before becoming King, aspires to be a chef. During a visit to Wiveton Hall Cafe, he expressed interest in working with a wood-fired pizza oven. Sadly, the cafe is closing next month due to rising costs and staffing issues.
summary: Prince George, could break the royal tradition of serving in the Armed Forces before becoming King, aspires to be a chef. During a visit to Wiveton Hall Cafe, he expressed interest in working with a wood-fired pizza oven. Sadly, the cafe is closing next month due to rising costs and staffing issues.

title: ‘I could feel my house shaking’: Milton tears across Florida
content: Hurricane Milton caused severe destruction in Florida, killing at least 10 people and knocking out power to over 3 million homes. Tampa's Tropicana Field was damaged, and St. Lucie County faced deadly tornadoes. Residents like Greg Cruz and Alex Franceschi shared harrowing experiences, while concerns grow over Fort Myers Beach's future amid rising property transformations.
summary: Hurricane Milton caused severe destruction in Florida, killing at least 10 people and knocking out power to over 3 million homes. Tampa's Tropicana Field was damaged, and St. Lucie County faced deadly tornadoes. Residents like Greg Cruz and Alex Franceschi shared harrowing experiences, while concerns grow over Fort Myers Beach's future amid rising property transformations.

title: Almost 10 million pounds of meat recalled in US after listeria risk
content: BrucePac recalls 9.9 million pounds of ready-to-eat meat and poultry products due to potential listeria contamination discovered during USDA testing. Though no illnesses are reported yet, symptoms can take up to 10 weeks to appear. The affected items were distributed nationwide, and the USDA advises disposal or return of these products.
summary: BrucePac recalls 9.9 million pounds of ready-to-eat meat and poultry products due to potential listeria contamination discovered during USDA testing. Though no illnesses are reported yet, symptoms can take up to 10 weeks to appear. The affected items were distributed nationwide, and the USDA advises disposal or return of these products.

title: Donald Trump's youngest daughter Tiffany is pregnant, former president says
content: Tiffany Trump, daughter of Donald Trump and Marla Maples, is expecting her first child with husband Michael Boulos. Raised in California, she graduated from Georgetown Law. Known for her low profile, Tiffany supported her father during his presidency and in legal matters. Michael, born in Lebanon, aids Trump’s reelection efforts, engaging with Arab and Muslim American leaders.
summary: Tiffany Trump, daughter of Donald Trump and Marla Maples, is expecting her first child with husband Michael Boulos. Raised in California, she graduated from Georgetown Law. Known for her low profile, Tiffany supported her father during his presidency and in legal matters. Michael, born in Lebanon, aids Trump’s reelection efforts, engaging with Arab and Muslim American leaders.

title: Colorado gold mine: 1 dead, 12 trapped after elevator malfunction
content: A fatal accident at Colorado's Mollie Kathleen Gold Mine left one person dead and 12 trapped after an elevator failure. Eleven others were rescued. Emergency crews are working to repair the elevator to reach the remaining trapped individuals. Rescuers maintain radio contact and are prepared for a rope rescue if necessary.
summary: A fatal accident at Colorado's Mollie Kathleen Gold Mine left one person dead and 12 trapped after an elevator failure. Eleven others were rescued. Emergency crews are working to repair the elevator to reach the remaining trapped individuals. Rescuers maintain radio contact and are prepared for a rope rescue if necessary.

title: Trump’s Flagrant podcast appearance hits 1.5m views, outdoing Harris' media blitz
content: As the US presidential election approaches, Kamala Harris and Donald Trump intensify media engagements. Harris appears on popular shows like The Late Show and Call Her Daddy, while Trump features on the Flagrant podcast. Trump's interview garners more views quickly. Polls indicate a tight race, with Harris slightly leading Trump.
summary: As the US presidential election approaches, Kamala Harris and Donald Trump intensify media engagements. Harris appears on popular shows like The Late Show and Call Her Daddy, while Trump features on the Flagrant podcast. Trump's interview garners more views quickly. Polls indicate a tight race, with Harris slightly leading Trump.

title: 'Get a life, man': Biden fires back at Trump over hurricane misinformation
content: President Biden rebukes former President Trump, urging him to prioritize aiding hurricane victims after allegations of a slow federal response. Biden highlights ongoing federal support and denounces misinformation. He praises Floridians for following evacuation orders and warns of remaining dangers post-Hurricane Milton.
summary: President Biden rebukes former President Trump, urging him to prioritize aiding hurricane victims after allegations of a slow federal response. Biden highlights ongoing federal support and denounces misinformation. He praises Floridians for following evacuation orders and warns of remaining dangers post-Hurricane Milton.

title: Pakistan: Islamabad, Rawalpindi to shut businesses for five days ahead of SCO summit
content: Islamabad and Rawalpindi will shut down businesses and several public services from October 12 to 16 for security reasons ahead of the SCO summit. The event will see leaders like China's Premier Li Qiang and India's Foreign Minister S. Jaishankar, marking his first visit to Pakistan.
summary: Islamabad and Rawalpindi will shut down businesses and several public services from October 12 to 16 for security reasons ahead of the SCO summit. The event will see leaders like China's Premier Li Qiang and India's Foreign Minister S. Jaishankar, marking his first visit to Pakistan.

title: Trump proposes new tax breaks, promises to end double taxation for Americans abroad
content: Donald Trump announced tax break proposals, including making car loan interest tax-deductible and ending double taxation for Americans abroad, aimed at swaying voters in key states. Economists are skeptical about funding and benefits, pointing to a potential increase in national debt. Audience reactions were mixed, reflecting varying opinions on his financial strategies.
summary: Donald Trump announced tax break proposals, including making car loan interest tax-deductible and ending double taxation for Americans abroad, aimed at swaying voters in key states. Economists are skeptical about funding and benefits, pointing to a potential increase in national debt. Audience reactions were mixed, reflecting varying opinions on his financial strategies.

title: New York man killed by a group of dogs in backyard
content: A 59-year-old man was killed by a group of dogs in Schenectady. Officers found James Provost being attacked by eight to nine mixed-breed pit bull dogs and one officer discharged his weapon to stop the attack. Authorities removed 24 dogs from the residence.
summary: A 59-year-old man was killed by a group of dogs in Schenectady. Officers found James Provost being attacked by eight to nine mixed-breed pit bull dogs and one officer discharged his weapon to stop the attack. Authorities removed 24 dogs from the residence.

title: 'She has no role...': What Florida governor DeSantis said about Harris's involvement in hurricane response
content: Florida governor Ron DeSantis criticised Kamala Harris for attempting to involve herself in the hurricane response, stating she has no role in it. DeSantis emphasised his collaboration with President Joe Biden and FEMA, accusing Harris of politicising the disaster for her campaign.
summary: Florida governor Ron DeSantis criticised Kamala Harris for attempting to involve herself in the hurricane response, stating she has no role in it. DeSantis emphasised his collaboration with President Joe Biden and FEMA, accusing Harris of politicising the disaster for her campaign.

title: TD Bank pleads guilty to money laundering violations, agrees to $3 billion penalty
content: TD Bank, the largest bank to date to admit to US Bank Secrecy Act violations, pleads guilty to money laundering-related charges and agrees to $3 billion in penalties. The Justice Department cites pervasive compliance failures over a decade. An asset cap limits TD's US operations, and CEO Bharat Masrani plans to retire, taking responsibility for the issues.
summary: TD Bank, the largest bank to date to admit to US Bank Secrecy Act violations, pleads guilty to money laundering-related charges and agrees to $3 billion in penalties. The Justice Department cites pervasive compliance failures over a decade. An asset cap limits TD's US operations, and CEO Bharat Masrani plans to retire, taking responsibility for the issues.
